Summary Note:
The RM first met Willems Snijders Vogel at a luxury car show in Amsterdam. They both admired the latest models and discussed their interest in high-end investments, leading to a productive business relationship.
With a career spanning nearly 21 years, Willems Snijders Vogel has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced he to join.
Family Background: Willems Snijders Vogel and Evelien have been married since 2004. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Willems graduated from St. Willibrorduscollege Deurne in 1998.
Willems completed his university education at Leiden University in 2004.
Moreover he completed his extra university education at NWO - Netherlands Organisation for Scientific Research in 2007.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 21 years, Willems Snijders Vogel has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Willems Snijders Vogel launched his career as a Plant Manager at AkzoNobel N.V., where he gained valuable experience from 2004 to 2005.
His subsequent role was as a Operations Director at Royal Dutch Shell plc, where he continued to grow professionally from 2005 till now.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 270000 EUR.
He has flat located in Tilburg, worth 1010000 EUR.

He inherited 1670000 EUR from his mother, a well-known Hedge Fund Manager, in 2006, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
